snippet: The American, who was abducted as he tried to leave Yemen after having taught English there for two years, was released after diplomatic negotiations....
lead_paragraph: The American, who was abducted as he tried to leave Yemen after having taught English there for two years, was released after diplomatic negotiations.

headline.main: Marine Veteran Held by Yemeni Rebels Since 2015 Is Freed
headline.print_headline: Marine Veteran, Held a Year by Yemeni Rebels, Is Freed
